CustomField.description: Shows either the invoice number or the authorize.net transaction number for each registration.
CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(Contract__c)=FALSE, Invoice_Number__c, IF(ISBLANK( Transaction_ID__c )=FALSE, TEXT( Transaction_ID__c ) , "" ))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Shows either the invoice number or the authorize.net transaction number for each registration.
CustomField.label: Payment Reference
